Show:

RouteController Class

Defined in: src/app/routes/controller.js:27

Yocto API : Routes Controller

Controller of routes based on Express

It read a jsonfile and create each routenode

Cors Express is enable to permit test with apidocjs

For more details on these dependencies read links below :

  • LodAsh : https://lodash.com/
  • yocto-logger : git+ssh://lab.yocto.digital:yocto-node-modules/yocto-utils.git
  • express : http://expressjs.com/
  • joi : https://github.com/hapijs/joi

  • Methods
  • Properties

Methods

addHTTPRequestGets

(
  • model
  • path
  • param
)

Defined in src/app/routes/controller.js:103

Implement the http request : GET and HEAD
Get an object
Send a error to the client if the request failed, or a json file to the client with the data requested if it's an GET requerst
OR if it's a head request, send a http header

Parameters:

  • model Object

    the data model object

  • path String

    the root path

  • param String

    The property to retrieve on url

addRoute

(
  • pathRequest
  • nameModel
  • reqExcluded
  • param
  • route
)
Boolean

Defined in src/app/routes/controller.js:83

Add a route to the main router

Parameters:

  • pathRequest String

    route to add

  • nameModel String

    name of the model object to retrieve into the controller of model

  • reqExcluded Array

    array of excluded request

  • param String

    name of the param to retrieve

  • route Object

    the current route

Returns:

Boolean:

If success return true, otherwise false

init

(
  • pathRoutes
  • pathModels
)
Boolean

Defined in src/app/routes/controller.js:315

Initialise the controller
Retrieve all routes and thoose alias and add there into router

Parameters:

  • pathRoutes String

    the path of the file route.json

  • pathModels String

    the path of folder that contains all models.json

Returns:

Boolean:

If success return true, otherwise false

post

(
  • Model
  • path
)

Defined in src/app/routes/controller.js:232

Implement the http request : POST
Add a new Object in DB
Send a error to the client if the request failed, otherwise a json file to the client with the data

Parameters:

  • Model Object

    the data model object (Model start with an uppercase for jshint validation)

  • path String

    The root path of model

Properties

ALL_HTTP_REQUESTS

Array of String

Defined in src/app/routes/controller.js:48

List of all http request that supported by api

Default: [ 'post', 'get', 'put', 'patch', 'delete', 'head']
